## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                  | Type                                                   | Default   |
| ----------- | ------------ | -------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | --------- |

| `height`    | `height`     | The component height                         | `string`                                               | `"auto"`  |
